attributes.action: Get the UK out of the Eurovision song contest
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The Eurovision Song Contest has now become a joke, with block votes becoming more prominent each year.

Even Sir Wogan has had enough of this farce. 

Perhaps if the UK withdraws, then the revenue they will lose, would be enough to kick the organisers in the backside to sort this out.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
